attributes.action: Ban The RSS(Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh),In The UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban The RSS(Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh),In The UK,Freeze their assets and funding.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban The RSS(Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh),In The UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16523

Prime Minister's Office
